item.title: What It Really Takes to Mow 4.5 Acres
item.description: Spent the day cutting and cleaning up the property using the zero turn, edging around the driveway, and trimming along fences, trees, and the house. The goal was to get everything looking cleaned up while leaving certain areas around the pond to help prevent erosion.

item.title: I Almost Got Arrested
